description: This module defines the namespace NgChm.MAPREP and sets up special values and supported map data summary levels for the NG-CHM representation.

member_variables.name: MAPREP.DETAIL_LEVEL
member_variables.description: Represents the detail level in the NG-CHM representation.

member_variables.name: MAPREP.RIBBON_HOR_LEVEL
member_variables.description: Represents the horizontal ribbon level in the NG-CHM representation.

member_variables.name: MAPREP.RIBBON_VERT_LEVEL
member_variables.description: Represents the vertical ribbon level in the NG-CHM representation.

member_variables.name: MAPREP.SUMMARY_LEVEL
member_variables.description: Represents the summary level in the NG-CHM representation.

member_variables.name: MAPREP.THUMBNAIL_LEVEL
member_variables.description: Represents the thumbnail level in the NG-CHM representation.

member_variables.name: MAPREP.maxValues
member_variables.description: Represents the maximum values in the NG-CHM representation.

member_variables.name: MAPREP.minValues
member_variables.description: Represents the minimum values in the NG-CHM representation.
